title: aDiyEn unnaruLai
sahitya:
aDiyEn unnaruLai aDaiya vENum ayyanE kaDalanaiyavE karuNai uDaiya vaDivElaiyanE


anupallavi

  naDaiyuDai bhAvanaiyil nava nAgarIka mOha maDamaikk-aDimaiyAgi mayangi mOsamurAdu


caraNam    ODit-tirindulagil nADiyadu kai kUDiDAdu vADi varundiya pin nADinEn undanaDiyai
ADi undan pugazhaip-pADi endan cintai kUDik-kuvindunnai kumbITT-uyyakkOrum
